titles.title: Medicare Coverage of Replacement Calcitriol Act of 2003

To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage under the Medicare Program of oral drugs to treat low blood calcium levels or elevated parathyroid hormone levels for patients with end stage renal disease.
Medicare Coverage of Replacement Calcitriol Act of 2003

bill.summary: Medicare Coverage of Replacement Calcitriol Act of 2003 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for Medicare coverage of oral drugs used to treat low blood calcium levels or elevated parathyroid hormone levels for end stage renal disease patients.
